meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nonflammable.
meanings.sent1: The nonflammabilities of the fireproof material made it a safe choice for the building construction.
meanings.sent2: Firefighters appreciate the nonflammabilities of their protective gear.
meanings.sent3: The magician's cloak had such strong nonflammabilities that even the flames of the dragon couldn't harm it.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor in the face of chaos was like the nonflammabilities of a rock in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The nonflammabilities of the special fabric were put to the test in the extreme heat of the desert.

meanings.definition: The ability to resist catching fire.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter's suit was designed with advanced nonflammabilities to ensure safety during rescue missions.
meanings.sent2: The nonflammabilities of the new insulation material impressed the safety inspectors.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape had such incredible nonflammabilities that even the villain's fire-based attacks couldn't harm it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the nonflammabilities of a shield against failure.
meanings.sent5: The nonflammabilities of the ancient artifact made it a valuable addition to the museum's collection.
